descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a shape composed of pixels in the upper portion of the grid and other pixels lower in the grid
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is the same as the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...  First copy the input grid.  Look at the lone upper shape, add colored pixels to the pixels lower in the grid such that they are of the same shape and color, even if they have to be proportionally larger or smaller, than the shape in the upper part of the field.

descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is the same as the input grid.

Look at the lone upper shape, add colored pixels to the pixels lower in the grid such that they are of the same shape and color, even if they have to be proportionally larger or smaller, than the shape in the upper part of the field.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a red and blue cross with 2 groups at the bottom
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...copy exact but make the lower group fill in to look like the shape  at the top.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...two different colors. You will also see one complete pattern.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...will be the same as input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...If you have the same amount of other colored squares, simply copy the pattern. If you have more other color squares, copy the pattern but be sure to fill in more space

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...two different colors. You will also see one complete pattern.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...will be the same as input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...If you have the same amount of other colored squares, simply copy the pattern. If you have more other color squares, copy the pattern but be sure to fill in more space

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a pattern of blue squares and some red squares
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to....fill in the black squares in between the red squares with the blue squares.  Each red square has one group of blue square

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...some colored patterns. the top pattern is the reference
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is not changed
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...add blue color fill to the red blocks to reproduce the upper shape. Leave the red blocks the same size. The new shape can be a different size.
